name: Quack Button
description:
The game you have been searching for your whole life and the only game you will ever need. Quack button provides you with the most useful function a game could ever provide: Press the button and do the QUACK!

Suitable for every situation, with the press of a button you can change your life and the life of those around you.

Quack button will never give you up, never let you down, never run around and desert you, Quack button will provide you with everything necessary for your physical and mental wellbeing.

Download today and do the QUACK!
